title: Peek Ahead for Coherence
text: Think about how the story pieces align and connect. Does one part naturally lead into the next?

title: Focus on the Essentials
text: Distill the story down to its core elements and see if it still holds meaning.

title: Evaluate the Structure
text: Assess the logical flow and structural integrity by briefly recounting the narrative.

hintAnswer: Tell the abbreviated story, in words.
title: Abridge and Analyze
text: Attempt to convey the story in fewer words, focusing on critical points to see if it retains clarity and flow.
choices: Ask someone else if it flows.
If the outline makes sense, it will flow.
Tell the abbreviated story, in words.
